mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_NO, MEMBERS_NAME, MEMBERS_ID, POST_ADDMAIN, PRODUCT_NAME, POST_DIV, CHECKING_RESULT, RECEIVE_STATE FROM DELIVERY INNER JOIN ORDERS ON DELIVERY.ORDERS_NO = ORDERS.ORDERS_NO INNER JOIN CHECKING ON ORDERS.ORDERS_NO = CHECKING.ORDERS_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERS ON ORDERS.MEMBERS_BUYER = MEMBERS.MEMBERS_NO INNER JOIN BUYING_ORDERS ON MEMBERS.MEMBERS_NO = BUYING_ORDERS.MEMBERS_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION ON BUYING_ORDERS.PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE = PRODUCT_OPTION.PRODUCT_OPTION_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON PRODUCT_OPTION.PRODUCT_CODE = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN CATEGORIES ON PRODUCT.CATEGORIES_CODE= CATEGORIES.CATEGORIES_CODE INNER JOIN BRAND ON PRODUCT.BRAND_NO= BRAND.BRAND_NO WHERE DELIVERY.ORDERS_NO = #{orderNo}
